events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but the size doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund or get guidance on how to return it.
The customer's inquiry mentioning refund and return has been categorized as a Refund case.
The case has been assigned to customer support representative Anna for processing the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund for the jacket that didn’t fit. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you also let us know if the jacket is unused and if you still have the original packaging available for the return?
My order number is #4523789. The jacket is brand new, unworn, and I have the original packaging intact.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund. Please use the prepaid return label we will email you shortly to send the jacket back to us.
That sounds great. I appreciate how quick and easy this process seems so far. I will wait for the return label email.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Once we receive the returned jacket, we will process your refund immediately.
Just following up to confirm if you have received the return label and if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
The case has been closed as the return label was sent and no further issues were reported. Thank you for contacting support.
